passage.title: My mother is coming
passage.paragraph: Today is Sunday. I don't go to school. I want to have a bus travel, because my uncle is a bus driver. The bus starts to move. After some time, it stops at a small village. A very old woman comes slowly.
My uncle wants to wait for her. When she gets on the bus, my uncle is going to close the door. But the old woman says, "Wait a minute. My mother is coming."
